message.content:
cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with secret sharing schemes and their repairability, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The use of linearized polynomials and regenerating codes in distributed storage systems suggests a connection to distributed systems (cs.DS) and computer networks (cs.CC). The paper also introduces a new repairing rate to characterize the performance and efficiency of the repairing function, which could fall under the category of signal processing (cs.SI).
